promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic chameleon electric-type pokemon wearing a yellow and black mask. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maskameleo, a a chibi cute basic chameleon electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Magnetic Blast, Damage Porter. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "electric" or "Maskameleo". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, chameleon-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This tiny creature dwells in rocky terrains, using its Magnetic Blast to scale cliffs with grace. Its Damage Porter power aids in warding off predators.
